note.p: Career: Lived in Paris, gaining experience in hospitals; a Huguenot, he left Paris after the Revocation of the Edict of Nantes and went to Amsterdam; Physician to the Prince of Orange, whom he accompanied to England (1689); Physician to Marshal Schomberg in Ireland; attached to the household of the Prince of Valdee; had an extensive practice in London; Commissioner for the Sick and Wounded; naturalised British (1696)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Hunter; Agnew; Shaw LD
Notes: Not on PL after 1717. Doubt as to the identity but he is possibly the one in M.
